name: World War Armies
summary:
Classic RTS experience finally on mobile! Bring your favorite strategy game anywhere!

World War Commander is a classic real-time strategy with online multiplayer battles set in the Second World War. Build your army and lead them to victory: over 40 types of units including infantry, vehicles and tanks, all at your command! Control the legendary war tanks, fire it up with flamethrowers, mortars and rifles, protect your base and try different tactics to destroy the enemy!

Compete with real opponents around the globe in 1vs1 online multiplayer! Prove to be the legendary war commander and defeat your rivals! World War Commander gives you limitless strategic opportunities making every battle unique!
